tool_description: An API that provides recipes from all over the world. Our database is always updated by the newest trending recipes from all over the world
name: Recipify
title: Recipify

api_list.name: Get today's hottest recipe
api_list.description: This endpoint returns one of today's hottest and popular recipe
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://recipify.p.rapidapi.com/today-recipe"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "recipify.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://recipify.p.rapidapi.com/today-recipe"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "recipify.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
